update-checker.running-latest: <white>You are running the latest version of <plugin_name>!
update-checker.update-found-console:
<white>An update was found for <plugin_name>!
    <white>Current version: <red>v<version_current>
    <white>Latest version: <green><click:open_url:'<download_link>'><hover:show_text:'<green>Open Download Page'>v<version_latest></hover></click>
update-checker.update-found-player:
<white>An update was found for <plugin_name>!
  <dark_gray>• <white>Current version: <red>v<version_current>
  <dark_gray>• <white>Latest version: <green><click:open_url:'<download_link>'><hover:show_text:'<green>Open Download Page'>v<version_latest></hover></click>

translation.help:
<white>Translations subcommands:
  <dark_gray>• <white>reload: <gray><i>Reloads the translation files.
  <dark_gray>• <white>test <node>: <gray><i>Test a translation.

spawner.has-architect: Looks like you already have company. I can't spare another architect to go with you.
spawner.has-town: Looks like you're already in a town. If you want to create your own town, you have to leave your current one first.
spawner.cannot-afford: You don't have enough money to create a new town right now. Come back when you have <price>⊚.
spawner.spawn: So you want to create a town? [Yes/No]
spawner.spawned: This architect will go with you. Lead them to where you want your new town, and let them work their magic.
spawner.come-back: Come back to me when you're ready to start your very own town.

error.resident-null: <red>Something went wrong. Please contact staff if this issue persists.
